definition: classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several

sentences.english: Spackled some butter over my whole-grain bread.
sentences.chinese: 在我的全麥麪包上抹了些許黃油。

sentences.english: What is happiness? With some fondle extension, she looked at me.
sentences.chinese: 幸福是什麼？她帶些許挑弄的延伸看着我。

sentences.english: Here are some simple thoughts that will hopefully bring a little balance back into your life.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有些小建議會給你的生活帶來些許平衡。

sentences.english: The market found only slight solace in retreating oil prices.
sentences.chinese: 市場僅在油價的回調中才找了些許安慰。

sentences.english: In front of the tongue and soles can also be found on the trapeze a little red flag.
sentences.chinese: 而在鞋舌和鞋底前端的飛人標誌上還可見些許白色。

sentences.english: And a slight chance of patchy sunshine later in the week.
sentences.chinese: 接近週末時又會出現些許陽光。

sentences.english: Pathetic attempts to convince oneself of the superiority of anything connected with Indians. Non-Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的企圖說服自己優勢與印第安人有些許的聯繫。

sentences.english: The researchers acknowledged the results may be biased since the study was based on a select group and might not apply to locked-in patients in general.
sentences.chinese: 研究者們坦承，研究結果也許是帶有些許偏見的。

sentences.english: Garrosh accepts the compliment with some skepticism.
sentences.chinese: 伽羅什帶着些許懷疑接受了這些讚許。

sentences.english: My few months of married life with Helen had been so much lotus eating.
sentences.chinese: 在和海倫度蜜月的些許時光全都被我用來胡喫海塞了。

sentences.english: As I touched the living Buddha's wrist I could feel his eyes gazing at me expectantly.
sentences.chinese: 號脈時，我感到他看我的目光中帶有些許期待。

sentences.english: In everyone look around talk smile, but I always feel arrive lose just some little.
sentences.chinese: 在大家的顧盼談笑中，我卻總感覺到些許的失落。

sentences.english: And , somehow or other , loveliness is infernally sad .
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，可愛竟令人感到有些許可憎的悲傷。

sentences.english: Like some sunshine in the window reading, reads the flavour of sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡在有些許陽光的窗前讀書，品讀陽光的味道。

sentences.english: And that is a bit uncomfortable for the Party.
sentences.chinese: 這種期望讓黨有些許不安。

sentences.english: Water is a very Aura, her way stream , there will always bring a bit of the story.
sentences.chinese: 水是極有靈氣，她一路流來，總會帶來些許故事。

definition: Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)
